description:
Show your boss or business partners what is happening, browsing thru all your reports turning the iPad in impressive Landscape or Portrait modes or track your websites traffic on the go with your iPhone.

The interface is made so clean and intuitive, that you will never want to stop looking at your websites :-)

More than 100 Reports with many filters and options show you nearly every detail of what is happening on your website!

*** Analytics is the most comprehensive Analytics App for your iPad and iPhone! ***


The Key-Features of Analytics:

+ Universal App, one license for iPhone and iPad
+ Full Access to All Google Analytics Reports including Real-Time Reports!
+ Save Reports for Offline Access
+ Bookmark frequently visited Reports and download them automatically for Offline Access
+ Fullscreen Reports
+ Multiple websites and networks support
+ Portrait and Landscape mode
+ Customizeable timeframes
+ Compare two timeframes to each other
+ Quick date selection: Todays Reports, Yesterdays Reports, This Weeks Reports, This Months Reports and more
+ Quick Auto-Login
+ report language support for all iOS languages
+ Built-In Browser to quickly check your websites
+ Dropbox-Connectivity for Offline Reports
+ AirPrint Support
+ Forward Reports via email as PDF, CSV or Excel TSV/XLSX
+ Retina Support

*** Analytics is optimized for your daily use:

+ It saves your last selections and presents it on App launch
+ Use Bookmarks to get reports with just one tap
+ Share Reports without leaving the App

*** And the best of it, it’s free! ***

*** If you still want more, you can upgrade to the Premium version using In-App-Purchase to: 

+ Access all Google Analytics Reports 
+ Get rid of the small Ad and support the future Development :-) 

.................................................................................................................................................................


You want to learn more?

* If you have any questions, feel free to drop us an email! You can contact us at http://analytics.favo.org/support
* You can find more screenshots at http://analytics.favo.org/screenshots
* Learn more about the features the help section http://analytics.favo.org/help


You need a valid Google Analytics Account to use this app.
If you don’t have one, register one for free at http://www.google.com/analytics/
trackCensoredName: Analytics for iPad - Google Analytics made easy
trackName: Analytics for iPad - Google Analytics made easy
